publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-681.1 Bill Aitken: Alcohol—As an amendment to motion (S3M-681) in the name of Kenny MacAskill, leave out from "notes the importance" to end and insert "and underlines the fact that those who do so should face losing their licences; notes the importance of close co-operation with, and support of, Scotland’s police forces and licensing boards in this respect, as well as developing a long-term strategy to tackle the negative effects of alcohol misuse, and further notes the need for the NHS to play its part in early identification and intervention for those individuals drinking at harmful or hazardous levels."
